metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000825 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
FreeCol version <= nightly-2018-08-22 contains a XML External Entity (XXE)vulnerability in FreeColXMLReader parser that can result in Disclosure ofconfidential data, denial of service, SSRF, port scanning. This attackappear to be exploitable via Freecol file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freecol - 0.11.6+dfsg2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freecol package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11.6+dfsg2-3').
